text.p: COAL - CMT TBN - 120,000/10 tonnes coal Dalrymple Bay/Kaohsiung 3/12 Oct $5.25 fio scale load/20,000 shinc Taipower.
Primo - 105,000/10 tonnes coal Hampton Roads/W.Dunkirk 20 Aug/5 Sep $6.10 fio three days shinc/25,000 shinc Kleimar.
TBN - 45,000 tonnes coke Xingang/Lulea 25/31 July $16.25 fio 3,500/8,000 CNR.
Panli - 50/55,000 tonnes coal Mississippi/Bourgas end July approx. $12.75/13 fio 35,000 shinc/10,000 shinc Klaveness (adds vessels name).
ORE - Cape Cathay - 120,000/10 tonnes ore Tubarao/Kaohsiung 1/15 Sep $9.95 fio 40,000 shinc/38,000 shinc China Steel.
EMS Ore - tonnes ore 90,000/10 W.Australia/Yantai end July $6 fio scale load/10,000 CNR.
